jobs.title: Senior Product Manager, New Product
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We’re Looking For

We are seeking a seasoned Senior Product Manager to build and lead new product initiatives from scratch. This is a unique opportunity to take a zero-to-one initiative, turn a clear product direction into reality, and shape how millions of people engage with wellness.

In this role, you’ll drive the product strategy and execution end-to-end, moving fast with lean iterations, learning quickly, and pivoting decisively. You’ll bring clarity in uncertainty, uncover deep user insights, and rally teams around bold product bets that can scale globally. Success will come from strong execution, sharp product judgment, and the ability to move lean and fast while learning quickly.

Key Responsibilities:

Product Strategy & Roadmap

  • Drive zero-to-one execution: design and deliver MVPs, validate hypotheses quickly, and scale what works

  • Translate the defined product vision into a clear and actionable experimentation and delivery roadmap

  • Build mechanisms that maximise user retention and consistency

Experimentation & Iteration

  • Design and run rapid experiments to test behavioural, community, and product mechanics

  • Learn fast: pivot, double down, or kill initiatives based on clear signals

  • Maintain a lean approach, avoiding over-engineering and focusing on speed to learning

User Insight & Data

  • Develop deep empathy for users who struggle with consistency and motivation

  • Combine quantitative data (funnels, retention curves, cohort analysis) with qualitative insights (user interviews, behavioural psychology)

  • Turn insights into simple, sticky product mechanics that drive daily engagement and long-term habit formation

Cross-Functional Leadership

  • Partner with design, engineering, content, growth, and data to deliver end-to-end solutions

  • Mobilise less-traditional partners (behavioral design, methodology, health, fitness and wellness experts) to bring the product vision to life

  • Inspire the team with clarity, conviction, and context in an uncertain environment

Retention & Growth Impact

  • Obsess over retention: ensure that every product decision drives long-term consistency

  • Design loops, programs, and accountability systems that help users stick

  • Tie product bets directly to measurable business impact (engagement, retention, revenue)

Skills & Mindset:

  • Builder: Proven zero-to-one experience; thrives in ambiguous, early-stage environments

  • Pragmatic & Lean: Moves fast, runs small experiments, learns quickly, and pivots decisively

  • Product Sense: Sharp judgment; knows what will resonate, stick, and scale. Strong taste in user experience and the ability to balance delight with feasibility

  • Business Acumen: Commercially sharp; translates product bets into retention, growth, and long-term business value

  • Insight-Driven: Exceptional empathy; skilled at uncovering hidden user needs and turning them into product opportunities

  • Experimenter: Bold, hypothesis-driven, comfortable with risk and learning from failure

  • Storyteller: Inspires teams and stakeholders with conviction and clarity

Candidate journey

⭕️ Recruiter call --> ⭕️ Meet a team member --> ⭕️ Skills assessment--> ⭕️ Meet the Leadership team

✨ Why You’ll Love Being Part of Welltech:

  • Grow Together: Join a culture that champions both personal and professional growth. Here, you’ll thrive as we learn, evolve, and succeed together.

  • Lead by Example: No matter your role, your leadership matters. Every team member is empowered to inspire and make an impact.

  • Results-Driven: We’re all about achieving meaningful outcomes. It’s not just about the effort, but the difference we make every day.

  • We Are Well-Makers: Be part of a movement that’s creating a healthier, happier world. Together, we make well-being a reality!

Check out some of our products

Muscle Booster — https://musclebooster.fitness/

Yoga-Go — https://yoga-go.io/

WalkFit - http://walkfit.pro

jobs.title: Senior Data Architect
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 200 million installs with three life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To transform lives through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700 passionate professionals with presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

As a Senior Data Architect/ Data Platform Technical Lead, you will play a pivotal role in transforming our data infrastructure to ensure seamless experiences for our customers and drive business growth. You will manage the development and governance of our data platform, ensuring it is reliable, scalable, and optimized for advanced analytics.

In this role, you’ll lead a team of data engineers and collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to design, build, and maintain a high-quality, cloud-native data ecosystem. Your work will be critical in enabling data-driven decision-making across the organization, powering everything from internal dashboards to real-time product features.

We’re looking for someone who combines deep technical expertise with strategic thinking and a passion for mentorship and architectural excellence.

Challenges you’ll meet:

  • Team Leadership and Mentorship: Lead and mentor a team of skilled data engineers, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented environment.

  • Data Platform Modernization: Redesign and modernize our existing data platform using the latest tools and technologies to enhance efficiency, accessibility, and scalability.

  • Cross-Team Collaboration: Collaborate closely with data analysis and product development teams to ensure efficient, reliable, and scalable data pipelines that contribute to informed decision-making.

  • Data Quality & Governance: Establish and enforce data quality frameworks, governance policies, and monitoring tools to ensure high data accuracy, consistency, and reliability.

  • Compliance & Security: Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and security best practices, minimizing risks related to data access and management.

  • Innovation and Testing: Test new approaches by creating Proof of Concepts (PoCs) and conducting benchmarks to continuously improve our data platform.

  • ETL/ELT Excellence: Develop, optimize, and maintain ETL/ELT processes to ensure high-quality and consistent data, supporting the integrity of our analytics and insights.

  • Best Practices and CI/CD Methods: Build robust pipelines for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), streamlining software delivery and enhancing efficiency in collaboration with development teams.

Your professional qualities:

  • 7+ years of experience in data engineering or backend systems, with at least 2+ years in a technical leadership or architect role.

  • Proven experience designing and building distributed data systems on the cloud.

  • Expertise in data modeling, warehousing (dimensional, denormalized, time-series), and data governance.

  • Strong experience with streaming architectures (e.g., Kinesis, Kafka) and batch ETL.

  • Deep understanding of CI/CD pipelines for data systems and infrastructure (preferably GitLab CI).

  • Excellent communication skills—able to influence stakeholders and guide technical decisions across departments.

  • Knowledge of data privacy regulations (GDPR, CCPA) and security standards.

  • A mentoring mindset—you’ve supported career growth of other engineers and improved team standards.

  • Experience balancing trade-offs between scalability, cost, speed, and maintainability.

Tech stack you’ll work with:

  • Cloud: AWS (Redshift, Spectrum, S3, RDS, Lambda, Kinesis, SQS, Glue, MWAA)

  • Languages: Python, SQL

  • Orchestration: Airflow (MWAA)

  • Modeling: dbt

  • CI/CD: GitLab CI (including GitLab administration)

  • Monitoring: Datadog, Grafana, Graylog

  • Event validation process: Iglu schema registry

  • APIs & Integrations: REST, OAuth, webhook ingestion

  • Infra-as-code (optional): Terraform

Nice to have:

  • Experience with additional AWS services: EMR, EKS, Athena, EC2.

  • Hands-on knowledge of alternative data warehouses like Snowflake or others.

  • Strong proficiency in PySpark for large-scale data processing.

  • Event Data Collection Tools: custom, Snowplow, Rudderstack, etc.

  • Familiarity with customer data platforms (CDPs) and real-time data processing.

Candidate journey: ⭕️ Recruiter call ➔ ⭕️ Technical call ➔ ⭕️ Meet the Leadership team

✨ Why You’ll Love Being Part of Welltech:

  • Grow Together: Join a culture that champions both personal and professional growth. Here, you’ll thrive as we learn, evolve, and succeed together.

  • Lead by Example: No matter your role, your leadership matters. Every team member is empowered to inspire and make an impact.

  • Results-Driven: We’re all about achieving meaningful outcomes. It’s not just about the effort, but the difference we make every day.

  • We Are Well-Makers: Be part of a movement that’s creating a healthier, happier world. Together, we make well-being a reality!

Yoga-Go — https://yoga-go.io/

What We're Looking For

We're looking for an experienced Influencer Marketing Manager (UGC), who will lead efforts to collaborate with influencers and creators, driving the production of high-quality UGC that embodies our brand's values. You'll handle the strategy, execution, and optimization of UGC campaigns, working closely with a team of creative producers and in-house production to achieve outstanding results. 

The ideal candidate will have a genuine passion for understanding and meeting user needs, a creative mindset, and a strong background in influencer and ugc marketing, particularly within the health & fitness or lifestyle niches.

In this role, your tasks will be:

  • Develop and implement UGC-focused influencer marketing campaigns targeting top-tier markets in the USA, LATAM, and Europe.

  • Identify and collaborate with influencers (bloggers, content creators, and UGC makers) across various platforms to produce high-quality content.

  • Cultivate new influencer relationships and explore channel expansion opportunities to achieve target goals and broaden our reach.

  • Manage and maintain daily communication with influencers to ensure timely delivery, adherence to contracts, and effective negotiation of compensation to maximize campaign results.

  • Craft engaging and clear briefs and scripts in close collaboration with the creative production team to ensure the content aligns with brand objectives and campaign goals.

  • Review video and image content to ensure accuracy and fulfillment of contractual obligations.

  • Use historical and current data to analyze and optimize UGC strategy.

  • Stay updated with social media trends to inform strategy and drive innovative content ideas, especially in UGC.

  • Explore new ways to innovate and enhance our influencer marketing approach, staying abreast of the latest trends.

Must-have skills you’ll need to bring:

  • 3+ years of experience in influencer marketing, preferably within health & fitness or lifestyle niches.

  • In-depth understanding of full cycle influencer marketing – strategic planning, identifying key metrics and indicators, campaign delivery, and evaluation of performance success across various platforms.

  • Proven experience with the US market.

  • Advanced proficiency in English, both written and verbal.

  • Strong communication and negotiation skills.

  • Solid grasp of current marketing tools and platforms.

  • Strong analytical skills to evaluate campaign performance and optimize strategies.

Nice-to-have qualifications:

  • Experience creating successful UGC campaigns.

  • Successful сase studies with TikTok influencers.

  • Background in video production, SMM, PR, or branding.

  • Upper-intermediate proficiency in Spanish.

  • Experience writing compelling copy that engages and drives conversions, including social media captions and video scripts.

Key soft skills:

  • Creative thinker with a passion for UGC content and storytelling.

  • Highly organized with excellent time management skills to juggle multiple projects.

  • Team player with effective problem-solving abilities and adaptability to changing circumstances.

  • Strong relationship-building skills to foster long-term partnerships with influencers and UGC creators.

  1. Team focused on crafting the new disruptive product experience as well as the system powering it

  2. Team on a mission to provide our users with world class wellness and fitness content through the new product experience

It’s a greenfield opportunity to try to disrupt the wellness & fitness industry. We are looking for product minded, impact-driven engineers to join us on this journey!

We are seeking a product-minded, impact-driven Senior Backend Engineer with strong experience in Domain Driven Design, cross-functional product development and Developer Productivity. In this role, you’ll collaborate with product, engineering, and data teams to spearhead the development of a greenfield product, evolve existing content management systems, and ensure our platforms remain robust, scalable, and efficient. You’ll be an advocate for highly iterative development approaches, data-driven decision-making in your team, fueling our mission to bring health and wellness to millions.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Spearhead development of a greenfield product: Collaborate with product, engineering, and data teams to spearhead development of a greenfield, data and multimedia powered product in the wellness & fitness space

  • Cross-functional collaboration: Work closely with product managers, designers, software engineers, content producers, data experts, and infrastructure teams

  • Mentor & lead by example: Provide guidance to team members, lead team level product and engineering initiatives, influence coding standards, support your team in making critical decisions

  • Set us up to maximize the pace of experimentation: Advocate for and drive implementation of highly iterative development practices and technical solutions that can allow us to maximize the pace of experimentation while maintaining quality

  • Be a champion of Engineering Excellence: Advocate for and implement best engineering practices, foster a learning culture, and influence strategic technical decisions in your team. Ensure scalability, performance, and reliability of systems owned by your team


Required Skills:

  • Strong product & business mindset: Proven ability to drive the building of successful products and/or platforms used by product teams, working closely with Product Managers, Designers, Domain experts to create value for customers

  • Domain Driven Design: comprehensive system design skills with proven impact building new and refactoring existing large-scale systems powering customer-facing products

  • Proven technical foundation: Strong hands-on engineering background on the backend, strong experience with relational and non-relational databases and AWS infrastructure (e.g. Lambda/API Gateway/SQS/SES/CloudFormation/CloudWatch)

  • Language and tool agnostic approach: Ready to pick the right tool for each challenge Experience with building efficient, scalable, reliable backend systems in Python or Kotlin is a plus. Our main language of programming is Python

  • System-level impact: Track record of influencing technical direction of your team and of effective collaboration with adjacent teams, with the ability to highlight risks, trade-offs and propose efficient solutions

  • Engineering culture & excellence: Demonstrated ability to shape and elevate engineering culture, methodologies, and best practices in your team

  • Developer productivity: Experienced in maximising developer productivity through the right technical choices, highly iterative development practices to achieve high pace of data-driven experimentation

  • End-to-end ownership and dealing with ambiguity: You thrive in ambiguous environments and get excited about figuring out solutions to complex problems, and taking a leading role in executing on them

  • (Nice to Have) Experience with Data and/or Multimedia

Ready to make a transformative impact on global wellness? Join us at Welltech and help millions of users lead healthier, happier lives!

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

Today, we are embarking on a journey to reshape our product into a highly personalized, coach-like experience that provides holistic care to our users across all aspects of wellness and fitness. To accomplish this, we are shaping a new team on a mission to provide our users with world-class wellness and fitness content through the new product experience.

It’s a greenfield opportunity to try to disrupt the wellness & fitness industry. We are looking for a product-minded, impact-driven engineer to join us on this journey!

What We're Looking For
We’re seeking a product-minded, impact-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer who thrives at the intersection of impact and innovation. You’ll help architect and build an end-to-end product experience, from backend systems to frontend interfaces, and collaborate closely with design, product, and data to move fast and learn even faster.

You bring backend expertise (Python preferably or a language agnostic approach), strong frontend fundamentals (React or similar), and a bias toward rapid learning through experimentation. While not required, we’d be especially excited if you’re curious about or experienced in mobile development.

You’ll be an advocate for highly iterative development approaches, data-driven decision-making in your team fueling our mission to bring health and wellness to millions.

Key responsibilities:

  • Shape a Greenfield Product: Build and evolve both frontend and backend systems for a brand-new wellness platform integrating video, content, data, and user interactivity.

  • Own the Full Stack Development: Take end-to-end ownership from designing APIs and building interfaces to connecting cloud services and instrumenting analytics.

  • Lead Frontend Development: Deliver responsive, performant UIs using TypeScript and modern frameworks like React or Next.js.

  • Drive Rapid Prototyping: Build lovable prototypes and MVPs to test product hypotheses quickly, iterating based on real user feedback and data.

  • Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Partner with product managers, designers, data experts, and content teams to bring cohesive, user-centric experiences to life.

  • Balance Quality & Speed: Maintain a clean, scalable codebase while shipping fast and learning fast.

  • Mentor & lead by example: Provide guidance to team members, lead team level product and engineering initiatives, influence coding standards, support your team in making critical decisions

Required skills:

  • Product Mindset: Proven ability to translate user needs into impactful product features, with a strong focus on delivering value.

  • Backend Engineering: Strong experience designing and building scalable backend systems. Proficient in Python or similar languages (e.g., Kotlin, Go, Java), with a solid understanding of API design, data modeling, and system architecture.

  • Frontend Familiarity: You have experience with modern frontend frameworks like React and TypeScript. Comfortable collaborating and architecting client-side features.

  • Cloud Infrastructure Experience: Familiarity with cloud services, especially AWS (e.g. Lambda, API Gateway, S3, CloudFormation).

  • Full-Stack System Design: Ability to architect and implement reliable, maintainable systems across the stack.

  • Fast Iteration and Experimentation: Experience in environments that favor rapid prototyping, testing, and learning.

  • Engineering Culture Contributor: You mentor peers, improve team workflows, and elevate code quality through strong practices and collaboration.

Nice to have:

  • Familiarity or interest in mobile development (React Native, Flutter) or building experiences involving video, multimedia, or streaming.

  • Grow Together: Join a culture that champions both personal and professional growth. Here, you’ll thrive as we learn, evolve, and succeed together.

  • Lead by Example: No matter your role, your leadership matters. Every team member is empowered to inspire and make an impact.

What We're Looking For

We’re looking for a strategic and academically grounded leader to head up our sports science, wellness, and expert strategy. This role will serve as the go-to authority for scientific and expert-driven input across our health and fitness platforms, managing our network of internal and external specialists in fitness, health psychology, and wellness.

You’ll play a critical role in shaping the expert credibility and scientific voice of our brand, ensuring our users receive trusted, transformative experiences grounded in real-world evidence and insight. This is a rare opportunity to lead at the intersection of content, science, and user experience—reporting directly to the Senior Director of Content and collaborating across Product, Brand and Marketing.

As Science Lead, you will work cross-functionally to define best-in-class, research-informed approaches to training, recovery and behavior change, ensuring our global wellness offerings are engaging, safe, and credible.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead and scale our global network of experts across sports science, nutrition, fitness, and behavioral health

  • Advanced degree in Exercise Science, Kinesiology, Health Psychology, Behavioral Science, or related field (PhD or MSc preferred)

  • Proven success leading expert teams, managing certifications/compliance and creating scalable health programs

 - Use behavioral science principles to inform content creation across training structure, motivation strategies and user experience design

Qualifications:

 - Strong understanding of digital health trends, user behavior, and motivation frameworks

 - Industry presence (e. speaking, publishing, or academic contributions)

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 200 million installs with three life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions.

Our Mission

To transform lives through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalised wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 800 passionate professionals with presence across 5 hubs.

What we're looking for

We're seeking a Product Design Lead to join our team and spearhead a revolution in user experience for Muscle Booster, our strength training app, that provides users with a personalized guidance offering tailored strength workout and nutrition plan.

In this role, you'll be instrumental in defining the visual identity of our apps, from creating seamless interfaces to designing captivating user journeys. You'll take charge of the design process, collaborating closely with diverse teams to transform intricate concepts into visually stunning, user-focused solutions to drive engagement and retention in the product.

This position is fully remote within our hubs in Cyprus, Spain, Poland, and Ukraine. We also welcome applicants from outside these locations who are open to relocating to one of them.

What is in store for you:

  • Transform Muscle Booster into the most engaging, simple and fun strength training in the market.

  • Create healthy habits for our users by designing a user experience that is based on deep user understanding and solve for the inner demons that stop our users from getting stronger.

  • Collaborate closely with the product leadership to shape and deliver on the product roadmap and vision

  • Lead and mentor a team of three passionate designers

Your professional qualities:

  • A strong portfolio showcasing your mobile app design expertise and your problem-solving skills

  • Previous experience in startups or early-stage companies is advantageous, particularly in achieving product-market fit and scaling efforts

  • Bachelor's degree in Design, Visual Arts, or a related field, or equivalent practical experience

  • Proficiency in design tools such as Figma or similar software

  • Solid understanding of user-centred design principles

  • Experience working closely with cross-functional teams including product managers, engineers, and other designers

  • Experience with mobile prototyping and user testing methodologies

  • Ability to thrive in a collaborative environment and provide mentorship to junior team members

  • Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and emerging technologies in mobile app design

jobs.title: Senior Data Engineer (Redshift)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

As a Senior Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in building and maintaining the foundation of our data ecosystem. You’ll work alongside data engineers, analysts, and product teams to create robust, scalable, and high-performance data pipelines and models. Your work will directly impact how we deliver insights, power product features, and enable data-driven decision-making across the company.

This role is perfect for someone who combines deep technical skills with a proactive mindset and thrives on solving complex data challenges in a collaborative environment.

Challenges You’ll Meet:

  • Pipeline Development and Optimization: Build and maintain reliable, scalable ETL/ELT pipelines using modern tools and best practices, ensuring efficient data flow for analytics and insights.

  • Data Modeling and Transformation: Design and implement effective data models that support business needs, enabling high-quality reporting and downstream analytics.

  • Collaboration Across Teams: Work closely with data analysts, product managers, and other engineers to understand data requirements and deliver solutions that meet the needs of the business.

  • Ensuring Data Quality: Develop and apply data quality checks, validation frameworks, and monitoring to ensure the consistency, accuracy, and reliability of data.

  • Performance and Efficiency: Identify and address performance issues in pipelines, queries, and data storage. Suggest and implement optimizations that enhance speed and reliability.

  • Security and Compliance: Follow data security best practices and ensure pipelines are built to meet data privacy and compliance standards.

  • Innovation and Continuous Improvement: Test new tools and approaches by building Proof of Concepts (PoCs) and conducting performance benchmarks to find the best solutions.

  • Automation and CI/CD Practices: Contribute to the development of robust CI/CD pipelines (GitLab CI or similar) for data workflows, supporting automated testing and deployment.

Required skills:

  • 4+ years of experience in data engineering or backend development, with a strong focus on building production-grade data pipelines.

  • 2-3+ years of experience working with AWS services (Administration of Redshift is a must),

  • Solid experience working with AWS services (Spectrum, S3, RDS, Glue, Lambda, Kinesis, SQS).

  • Proficient in Python and SQL for data transformation and automation.

  • Experience with dbt for data modeling and transformation.

  • Good understanding of streaming architectures and micro-batching for real-time data needs.

  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines for data workflows (preferably GitLab CI).

  • Familiarity with event schema validation tools/ solutions (Snowplow, Schema Registry).

  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
    Strong problem-solving skills—able to dig into data issues, propose solutions, and deliver clean, reliable outcomes.

  • A growth mindset—enthusiastic about learning new tools, sharing knowledge, and improving team practices.

Tech Stack You’ll Work With:

  • Cloud: AWS (Redshift, Spectrum, S3, RDS, Lambda, Kinesis, SQS, Glue, MWAA)

  • Languages: Python, SQL

  • Orchestration: Airflow (MWAA)

  • Modeling: dbt

  • CI/CD: GitLab CI (including GitLab administration)

  • Monitoring: Datadog, Grafana, Graylog

  • Event validation process: Iglu schema registry

  • APIs & Integrations: REST, OAuth, webhook ingestion

  • Infra-as-code (optional): Terraform

Bonus Points / Nice to Have:

  • Experience with additional AWS services: EMR, EKS, Athena, EC2.

  • Hands-on knowledge of alternative data warehouses like Snowflake or others.

  • Experience with PySpark for big data processing.

  • Familiarity with event data collection tools (Snowplow, Rudderstack, etc.).

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

Why Welltech?

Imagine making a global impact on health and wellness as part of our team! At Welltech, you'll have the opportunity to shape the future of our products and company, directly influencing the lives of millions. We're at an exciting juncture with a loyal customer base and many opportunities ahead.

Thrive in Our Dynamic Culture:

  • Empowerment: We encourage team members to take ownership and make impactful decisions.

  • Clear Communication: We foster a collaborative environment with open and direct communication.

  • Innovation: Join us in our passion for creating cutting-edge solutions and be part of something big!

Welltech’s success and continued growth bring exciting challenges in securing our products, infrastructure and operations. We are seeking a talented and motivated Senior Security Engineer (x/f/m) to join our small but dedicated Security Team. In this role, you will play a crucial part in strengthening our overall security posture, collaborate across teams and domains, and own security initiatives company-wide.

In this role, you’ll:

  • Own and drive execution of multiple key security initiatives, ensuring they are well-integrated, documented, and effectively support Welltech’s security goals.

  • Collaborate with leadership to shape the team’s roadmap, providing your expertise.

  • Mentor junior team members in the Security team to help them grow in their role.

  • Collaborate with engineering, IT, and product teams to embed security best practices throughout the development lifecycle and operational processes.

  • Champion continuous improvement in Security Engineering by regularly reviewing processes, implementing automation, and driving standardization to enhance team efficiency and organizational impact

  • Lead PCI-DSS Compliance initiative with relevant stakeholders

  • Design, implement, and maintain security controls and measures across Welltech’s systems, networks, and cloud environments.

  • Contribute to threat modeling, risk assessments, and incident response, supporting a proactive and resilient security posture.

  • Develop and refine internal security policies, standards, and tools to support company-wide security goals.

  • Support and lead security awareness efforts, helping to foster a strong security culture throughout the organization.

  • Continuously evaluate emerging threats, technologies, and practices, driving improvements to Welltech’s overall security maturity.

Required Skills:

  • 5+ years of hands-on security engineering experience with proven expertise in implementing and managing security solutions

  • Solid understanding of security principles, vulnerabilities, and common attack techniques.

  • Proficiency with Python (especially writing Lambda functions).

  • Solid Experience with PCI.

  • Experience with Kubernetes in production environments.

  • Familiarity with CI/CD tooling and secure deployment practices.

  • Very good knowledge of cloud platforms - AWS or Google Cloud.

  • Nice to have: Experience with application security, DLP platforms, and observability.

Soft skills:

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

  • A collaborative, proactive mindset and passion for continuous improvement.

  • Ability to clearly communicate complex security concepts to technical and non-technical stakeholders.

  • Strong organizational skills to effectively prioritize and manage multiple concurrent tasks and meet deadlines.

Why join us?

  • Make a meaningful impact in a small, dedicated security team.

  • Work in a dynamic environment where your ideas and initiatives matter.

  • Opportunity to grow your skills across multiple security domains.

Ready to help us build a secure future? Apply now and join Welltech’s mission to keep our products and users safe.

Candidate journey: ⭕️ Recruiter call ----> ⭕️ Live Coding -----> ⭕️ Skills assessment -----> ⭕️ Meet the hiring manager

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We’re looking for a proactive, detail-oriented, and user-driven Content Manager to help deliver high quality and impactful in-product content for a next-generation health and wellness mobile app. This role focuses on in-app experiences — including video classes, written guidance, recipes, and interactive features.

As Content Manager, you’ll play a key role in executing and operationalizing the content strategy, managing production workflows, ensuring quality, and using data to drive improvements. You'll collaborate cross-functionally with product, design, and research teams to deliver content that’s engaging, effective, and aligned with our users’ goals.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage the end-to-end workflow of in-app content initiatives — from planning through to launch across multimedia formats (video, audio, text, interactive), ensuring timely delivery and consistent quality.

  • Maintain and enforce editorial standards and brand guidelines across all content types.

  • Collaborate with content strategists, designers, producers, and subject matter experts to deliver high-impact, user-centered content.

  • Partner with UX researchers and analysts to incorporate user insights and behavioral data into content decisions and iterations.

🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We are seeking a seasoned legal professional with extensive experience advising international technology companies. The successful candidate will join our Corporate & Commercial legal team and be responsible for a broad range of corporate and commercial matters across our global operations. This role does not include responsibility for privacy, intellectual property, or product compliance, which are handled by separate teams.

You will leverage your deep expertise to drive cross‑functional projects, support our continued expansion across multiple jurisdictions, and serve as a trusted advisor to senior leadership. A pragmatic, business‑oriented approach, strong communication skills, and the ability to operate in a fast‑paced, international environment are essential.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead Projects & Transactions: Drive complex cross‑functional initiatives across Europe, the UK, the US, and other jurisdictions, including market entry and expansion, strategic partnerships, cross-border transactions, and global hiring programmes. Coordinate with external advisors and internal stakeholders to ensure compliance, efficiency, and successful outcomes

  • Corporate & Commercial Advisory: Provide strategic, business‑focused legal advice on a wide spectrum of corporate and commercial matters, such as corporate governance, entity maintenance, structuring, capitalisation, contracting, and regulatory requirements. Draft, review, and negotiate a variety of commercial agreements (e.g. supplier, customer, partnership, etc)

  • Operational Excellence: Manage day‑to‑day legal tasks and ensure the efficient delivery of legal services across the organisation. Develop and implement processes, templates, and playbooks to improve workflows, promote consistent standards, and support scalability

  • Risk Management & Compliance: Identify, assess, and mitigate legal risks associated with our operations. Monitor regulatory developments relevant to international technology companies and implement necessary changes to maintain compliance. Oversee any legal matters outside privacy, intellectual property, and product compliance

  • Stakeholder Engagement: Build trusted relationships with key stakeholders across the business and with external counsel. Act as a strategic partner to leadership, translating complex legal concepts into clear, practical advice and enabling sound decision‑making

  • Process Improvement: Continuously refine and improve legal processes and procedures within the Corporate & Commercial department, collaborating with other legal functions to promote knowledge sharing and operational efficiency

Required Qualifications:

  • Qualified lawyer with at least 8 years’ post‑qualification experience gained in a top‑tier law firm and/or in‑house at a multinational technology company; candidates with both law firm and in‑house backgrounds will be strongly preferred

  • Demonstrated experience leading complex cross‑border corporate and commercial projects, particularly involving Europe, the UK, and the US

  • Proven track record supporting international technology companies and navigating diverse regulatory environments

  • Exceptional drafting and negotiation skills with the ability to structure and close a wide range of commercial agreements

  • Strong leadership and project management skills, with an ability to drive initiatives from inception to completion while collaborating effectively with cross‑functional teams

  • Fluency in English at a C1 level, other languages are a plus

  • Excellent communicator and confident negotiator with the ability to simplify complex legal issues for non‑lawyers and influence stakeholders at all levels

  • High degree of business acumen, problem‑solving aptitude, and ability to balance legal risk against business objectives

Candidate journey

⭕️ Recruiter call --> ⭕️ Meet a team member --> ⭕️ Skills assessment--> ⭕️ Business case --> ⭕️ Meet the Leadership team

🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in the Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 200 million installs with five life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To transform lives through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700 passionate professionals with presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech and why now?
Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves to push the boundaries of what’s possible.

Today we are embarking on a journey to reshape our product into a highly personalized, coach-like experience that provides holistic care to our users across all aspects of wellness and fitness. To accomplish this we are starting two new teams:

  1. Team focused on crafting the new disruptive product experience as well as the system powering it

  2. Team on a mission to provide our users with world class wellness and fitness content through the new product experience

It’s a greenfield opportunity to try to disrupt the wellness & fitness industry. We are looking for product minded, impact-driven engineers to join us on this journey!

What We’re Looking For

We are seeking a product-minded, impact-driven Senior Backend Engineer with strong experience in Domain Driven Design, cross-functional product development and Developer Productivity. In this role, you’ll collaborate with product, engineering, and data teams to spearhead the development of a greenfield product, evolve existing content management systems, and ensure our platforms remain robust, scalable, and efficient. You’ll be an advocate for highly iterative development approaches, data-driven decision-making in your team, fueling our mission to bring health and wellness to millions.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Spearhead development of a greenfield product: Collaborate with product, engineering, and data teams to spearhead development of a greenfield, data and multimedia powered product in the wellness & fitness space

  • Cross-functional collaboration: Work closely with product managers, designers, software engineers, content producers, data experts, and infrastructure teams

  • Mentor & lead by example: Provide guidance to team members, lead team level product and engineering initiatives, influence coding standards, support your team in making critical decisions

  • Set us up to maximize the pace of experimentation: Advocate for and drive implementation of highly iterative development practices and technical solutions that can allow us to maximize the pace of experimentation while maintaining quality

  • Be a champion of Engineering Excellence: Advocate for and implement best engineering practices, foster a learning culture, and influence strategic technical decisions in your team. Ensure scalability, performance, and reliability of systems owned by your team


Required Skills:

  • Strong product & business mindset: Proven ability to drive the building of successful products and/or platforms used by product teams, working closely with Product Managers, Designers, Domain experts to create value for customers

  • Domain Driven Design: comprehensive system design skills with proven impact building new and refactoring existing large-scale systems powering customer-facing products

  • Proven technical foundation: Strong hands-on engineering background on the backend, strong experience with relational and non-relational databases and AWS infrastructure (e.g. Lambda/API Gateway/SQS/SES/CloudFormation/CloudWatch)

  • Language and tool agnostic approach: Ready to pick the right tool for each challenge Experience with building efficient, scalable, reliable backend systems in Python or Kotlin is a plus. Our main language of programming is Python

  • System-level impact: Track record of influencing technical direction of your team and of effective collaboration with adjacent teams, with the ability to highlight risks, trade-offs and propose efficient solutions

  • Engineering culture & excellence: Demonstrated ability to shape and elevate engineering culture, methodologies, and best practices in your team

  • Developer productivity: Experienced in maximising developer productivity through the right technical choices, highly iterative development practices to achieve high pace of data-driven experimentation

  • End-to-end ownership and dealing with ambiguity: You thrive in ambiguous environments and get excited about figuring out solutions to complex problems, and taking a leading role in executing on them

  • (Nice to Have) Experience with Data and/or Multimedia

Ready to make a transformative impact on global wellness? Join us at Welltech and help millions of users lead healthier, happier lives!

As we are growing our hub in Cyprus, we are offering full relocation support for this role. You’ll receive assistance with everything from visa and paperwork to finding accommodation and settling in. Whether you’re moving alone or with your family, our team will ensure a smooth and stress-free transition. Join us in beautiful Cyprus and be part of an exciting new chapter as we expand our presence on the island!

Candidate journey

⭕️ Recruiter call --> ⭕️ Live code review --> ⭕️ System Design Interview --> ⭕️ Meet the Hiring Manager

Why You'll Love Working at Welltech:

✨ Why You’ll Love Being Part of Welltech:

  • Grow Together: Join a culture that champions both personal and professional growth. Here, you’ll thrive as we learn, evolve, and succeed together.

  • Lead by Example: No matter your role, your leadership matters. Every team member is empowered to inspire and make an impact.

  • Results-Driven: We’re all about achieving meaningful outcomes. It’s not just about the effort, but the difference we make every day.

  • We Are Well-Makers: Be part of a movement that’s creating a healthier, happier world. Together, we make well-being a reality!

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with three life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 750+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

As a CRM Analyst, you'll play a key role in optimizing our current operations and ensuring data-driven decisions under the Marketing Analytics department.


Key responsibilities:

  • Improving Dashboard & Reporting Efficiency: Creating and maintaining performance and deep dive reports, ensuring data accuracy and accessibility.

  • Enhancing A/B Test Analysis: Conducting additional calculations for A/B tests and providing optimization recommendations.

  • Delivering Prompt Ad-Hoc Data: Fulfilling specific data requests for strategic planning, segmentation, and troubleshooting.

  • Proactive Data Quality Management: Monitoring data integrity, identifying, and resolving discrepancies, and collaborating on data source improvements.

  • Conducting Root Cause Analysis: Investigating performance dips or spikes to identify underlying causes and support strategic decisions.

  • Supporting CRM Team Meetings: Preparing data and presenting findings to the CRM team to align on goals and strategies.

Required skills:

  • 3+ years of experience working with mobile products in a Product or Data Analyst role.

  • Strong experience working with raw data, demonstrating excellent SQL knowledge. (Python will be a significant plus).

  • Proficiency with data visualization tools, specifically Tableau.

  • Demonstrated experience with the process of continuous A/B testing, including detailed performance analysis.

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate complex data into clear, actionable insights.

  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, capable of conveying technical findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Nice to have:

  • Basic knowledge of marketing analytics and attribution

  • Experience with User Lifecycle Management

  • Experience with B2C subscription models

You will design and implement core platform solutions, empowering product teams to rapidly build and customize applications. This role demands a strong problem-solver who thrives on building, as you'll define a platform that scales to millions, creating a lasting legacy in mobile wellness.

Key responsibilities:

  • Help build and evolve scalable mobile infrastructure, tooling, and shared components to support multiple Welltech mobile apps

  • Contribute to libraries, SDKs, and CI/CD pipelines that improve developer experience and apps quality

  • Work closely with product teams to support the adoption of platform solutions

  • Write clean, testable, and performant code with an eye on maintainability

  • Support modularization, reusability, and standardization efforts across mobile apps

  • Identify common problems across apps and solve them in a consistent, scalable way

  • Participate in code reviews, documentation, and knowledge sharing within the team

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with backend, frontend, security, and infrastructure teams to enable seamless integration and platform alignment

Required skills:

  • Solid iOS development experience with Swift, including fundamentals like networking, persistence, and async operations

  • Strong experience with TCA and composable, modular UI architectures

  • Excellent understanding of architectural patterns (MVVM, MVI, DI) and modular codebases

  • Proven ability to craft clean, maintainable, and scalable code

  • Strong ability to design for reliability, scalability, and performance

  • Experience working with CI/CD pipelines and tooling (e.g., Bitrise, Fastlane, custom scripts)

  • Strong advocate of design for testability, automated testing, and shift-left quality mindset

  • Passion for improving developer experience and shipping high-quality code

  • Product-minded approach with a bias for pragmatic, maintainable solutions

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 800+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We’re looking for a Senior Product Designer to join our growing team and take ownership of key design initiatives for the fastest-scaling apps in Welltech’s fitness portfolio — helping people build healthier daily habits through joyful, achievable everyday movement.

You'll operate with a high degree of autonomy, owning major surfaces and workflows from discovery through to execution. You’ll work cross-functionally to shape intuitive, habit-forming product experiences that are emotionally resonant and data-informed. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment, has strong executional range, cares deeply about user insight, and is energized by building joyful mobile experiences at scale.

This position is fully remote within our hubs in Cyprus, Spain, Poland, and Ukraine. We also welcome applicants from outside these locations who are open to relocating to one of them.

Key responsibilities

  • Shape the core user experience by introducing personalized and joyful product design, user journeys, and features that feel thoughtful, seamless, and human.

  • Create prototypes and motion-rich interactions that tell compelling product stories and bring ideas to life.

  • Drive design experimentation through A/B testing and data-driven insights, using empathy to guide product direction.

  • Collaborate closely with product managers, researchers, data analysts, and engineers to explore and solve real user problems, not just ship features.

  • Design with a systems mindset, contributing to and evolving our shared design system for consistency across platforms (iOS and Android).

  • Advocate for the user, helping the team make trade-offs that prioritize long-term trust and engagement.

  • Bring a strong design perspective to feedback and team rituals, actively engaging to elevate quality and strengthen design culture.

Required skills:

  • Craft and care: exceptional design craft, with a sharp eye for visual polish and interaction nuance.

  • Fluency in Figma: skilled in prototyping, component systems, auto-layout, and variables.

  • Hands-on mobile design: proven expertise in building experiences that captivate users and drive retention metrics (iOS and Android).

  • Persuasive storytelling: able to communicate complex ideas with clarity and confidence.

  • Strategic thinking: balances broad vision with a focus on what drives business outcomes.

  • Intellectual curiosity: proactively asks questions, seeks feedback, and explores alternatives to improve outcomes.

  • Bias for action: operates with autonomy; able to prioritize, make decisions, and drive work forward in the face of ambiguity.

  • Team-first mentality: brings clarity, energy, and humility to cross-functional teamwork with PMs, engineers, and researchers.

  • User-centered mindset: strong foundation in user research methods (interviews, usability testing, etc.), and the ability to turn insights into action.

Nice to have

  • Experience working on health, wellness, fitness, or behavior change products.

  • Familiarity with behavioral design principles (e.g., Fogg Behavior Model, Hook Model) to create habit-forming, science-backed experiences.

  • Experience mentoring junior designers or elevating team craft informally.


Candidate journey

⭕️ Recruiter Call → ⭕️ Meet the Hiring Manager → ⭕️ Test Task → ⭕️ Meet the Team

Why you’ll love being part of Welltech

  • Grow Together: We champion both personal and professional development.

  • Lead by Example: Everyone is empowered to make an impact.

  • Results-Driven: It’s not just about doing the work—it’s about making a difference.

  • We Are Well-Makers: Join us in building a healthier, happier world—step by step.

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 200 million installs with five life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To transform lives through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700 passionate professionals with presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We are looking for a Senior Back-end Developer (Java) who is dreaming of developing ambitious tech products. You’ll join our Payments team, a core part of our tech organization that’s building a modern, internal payments platform from the ground up. Our mission is to streamline and future-proof payment operations across the entire business. We're not just maintaining systems—we’re rethinking how payments should work in fast-scaling products.

The team is a highly collaborative, cross-functional group with deep expertise in infrastructure, databases, distributed systems, and back-end engineering. We value autonomy, ownership, and knowledge-sharing, and we’re always looking for new ideas to make our systems smarter, faster, and more secure. You’ll have the opportunity to work on technically rich projects that have real, measurable business impact—and have a lot of fun along the way.

Key responsibilities:

  • Collaborate across disciplines: Work closely with cross-functional teams including Frontend/Backend Engineers, Infrastructure, QA (SDET), and Product Managers to design, develop, and deliver innovative solutions that drive real impact.

  • Design and implement robust systems: Translate both functional and non-functional requirements into scalable, reliable, and maintainable software. Your code will directly shape user experiences and system integrity.

  • Build and operate microservices: Develop, deploy, and maintain high-performance microservices using Spring Boot. Own your services end-to-end—from design and implementation to deployment and ongoing support.

  • Operate in cloud-native environments: Manage deployments and configurations across various Kubernetes clusters, ensuring smooth rollouts and minimal downtime in production and staging environments.

  • Champion system excellence: Take responsibility for the performance, scalability, security, and data consistency of the systems your team owns. Proactively identify bottlenecks and propose architectural improvements.

  • Drive engineering best practices: Promote clean code, test automation, continuous integration, and DevOps principles. Help elevate the engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews, tech talks, and collaboration.

  • Mentor & lead by example: Provide guidance to team members, lead team level product and engineering initiatives, influence coding standards, support your team in making critical decisions

Required skills:

  • Proven Java expertise: At least 5 years of hands-on experience building robust, high-performance applications using Java in production environments.

  • Microservices architecture knowledge: A strong grasp of microservices principles, with a track record of designing and scaling distributed systems effectively.

  • Spring Boot mastery: Deep, practical experience with the Spring Boot ecosystem—particularly with Spring MVC, RESTful services, Spring Data, Security, and messaging integrations.

  • Database skills: Solid experience working with relational databases like PostgreSQL, including an understanding of relational database design, query optimization, and overall data architecture.

  • Cloud infrastructure and Cloud-native deployment experience: Previous experience with AWS or another major cloud provider; practical experience deploying and managing services in Kubernetes across multiple environments (e.g., dev, staging, production).

  • API and communication protocol fluency: Comfort working with REST, gRPC, messaging systems, and asynchronous communication patterns.

  • CI/CD and DevOps mindset: A solid understanding of modern CI/CD pipelines, quality gates, and automation practices that support fast, safe releases.

  • Quality-first approach: Demonstrated experience writing comprehensive unit, integration, and API tests for microservices-based systems.

  • High proficiency in both written and spoken English, enabling seamless collaboration in an international team.

Nice to have:

  • Fintech domain experience: Previous experience working on fintech products or platforms, with an understanding of industry-specific challenges such as security, compliance, payment processing, and subscription billing.

  • Stream processing knowledge: Proficiency with Kafka and Kafka Streams for real-time data processing and event-driven architecture.

  • Modern app design principles: Familiarity with The Twelve-Factor App methodology and its application in cloud-native service design.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For
We’re seeking product-oriented and mission-driven Frontend Engineer to join the User Trust Team working on a User Profile initiative - an essential part of our platform foundations and Ecosystem. The team safeguards and enhances the user journey across platforms by managing authentication, identity, and privacy workflows. From handling data takeout and deletion requests to developing a unified user profile experience, we’re focused on giving users control while unlocking smarter, more personalized product experiences. You’ll join a cross-functional team in the discovery phase of a critical initiative - streamlining user identity and profile management across our core products to improve operational efficiency and drive growth.

Key responsibilities:

Collaborate Across Functions: Partner with Engineers, QA, Product Analysts, and Product Managers to design solutions that solve real user and business problems

Build with Purpose: Develop high-impact features using a modern stack (React 18+, TypeScript 5+, Styled Components, React Query, Vite)

Deliver Quality at Speed: Build clean, tested, and maintainable code with performance, scalability, and UX in mind

Contribute to Team Excellence: Take part in thoughtful code reviews, documentation, and monitoring (Sentry, Datadog)

Learn & Iterate: Participate in A/B tests, analyze outcomes, and use insights to guide product and code decisions

Own What You Build: From development to deployment, be accountable for delivering features that perform reliably in production

Required skills:

  • Experience in frontend development (3+ years) at a product-driven company

  • Proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, React, and Redux Saga

  • Strong understanding of REST APIs, Core Web Vitals, and responsive design

  • Solid grasp of software design principles (SOLID, design patterns, maintainable architecture)

  • Experience working in cross-functional, fast-paced agile teams and communicating effectively in English (C1)

  • A curious, user-first mindset with a desire to deliver intuitive, delightful digital experiences

Nice to have:

  • Experience working with experimentation platforms and running A/B or multivariate tests

  • Experience with Material UI and its design philosophy

  • Familiarity with Next.js, SSR, and performance optimization

The confidence to set up or optimize bundler configs (Webpack/Vite) from scratch

What We're Looking For

We are looking for a skilled and enthusiastic Senior Helpdesk Engineer to join our IT team. In this role, you will be the first point of contact for employees seeking technical assistance. You will be responsible for troubleshooting a variety of IT issues, ensuring smooth operation of our systems, and providing excellent customer service to our employees.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Provide timely and effective technical support to employees via email and our ticketing system.

  • Troubleshoot issues related to Google Workspace, Okta, MacOS, and Mobile Device Management (MDM).

  • Resolve technical problems with various web services, including Slack, Confluence or Jira.

  • Prepare and configure new employee workstations, including hardware setup and software installation.

  • Maintain detailed records of user requests and resolutions in the ticketing system (Jira Service Management - a plus).

  • Escalate complex issues to senior IT staff when necessary.

  • Develop and maintain comprehensive technical documentation, such as user manuals and system configurations.

  • Deliver user training and guidance on Google Workspace and MacOS applications.

  • Collaborate with the IT team to identify and implement system improvements and upgrades.

Required skills:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in a technical support role with a focus on Google Workspace and MacOS.

  • Strong technical skills and experience with:

    • Google Workspace administration

    • Okta administration

    • MacOS and Mobile Device Management (MDM)

    • Troubleshooting technical issues

  • Experience providing remote support to a distributed workforce

  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to explain technical concepts clearly to non-technical users.

  • Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

  • Experience with an ITSM solution (Jira Service Management - a plus)

Will be a Plus:

  • Experience with Jamf solutions

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented Senior Product Manager to join our team and focus on our user onboarding journey. In this pivotal role, you will be responsible for the end-to-end user experience and guiding new users to their first purchase across our three apps (Walkfit, Muscle Booster and Yoga-Go). You will drive the product vision, strategy, and execution for your squad, ensuring we deliver exceptional value to our new users and effectively convert them into subscribers.

We need the one who is strong in product discovery, skilled at assessing market fit, and comfortable with testing and experimenting with new channels, products, and audiences. The ideal person is highly customer-centric, outcome-driven, and a proactive collaborator with marketing, design, engineering, business, and other product teams.

Key Responsibilities:

Product Strategy & Roadmap

  • Create and maintain the product roadmap for your squad, ensuring it aligns with business objectives and user needs

  • Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities for product innovation within the user onboarding journey

  • Define and prioritize product hypotheses based on data-driven insights and user feedback, with the goal of improving the onboarding experience and converting users that will stay

Product Execution

  • Collaborate closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to deliver high-quality product features that optimize the user journey from landing to purchase

  • Manage the product lifecycle from concept to launch, ensuring timely and effective execution

  • Utilize Agile methodologies (Scrum) to manage product development and iterate on features. You will work closely with the Engineering Manager to lead squad delivery together

User Focus & Data Analysis

  • Conduct user research and gather feedback to understand the specific needs and pain points of new users during the onboarding process

  • Analyze product data and user behavior to identify trends and opportunities to improve the onboarding funnel

  • Run A/B tests to optimize product features and enhance the user experience, focusing on improving key onboarding metrics

  • Base all product decisions on data

Collaboration & Communication

  • Communicate the product vision and strategy for the onboarding funnel to stakeholders across the organization

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment and effective execution of onboarding initiatives

  • Actively engage with product communities to bring external insights into the product and inform onboarding strategies

Qualifications:

  • Previous B2C experience with onboarding flows and subscription models is preferred

  • Strong experience in product discovery and assessing market fit

  • Demonstrated ability to test and experiment with new channels, products, and/or audiences

Candidate journey

⭕️ Recruiter call --> ⭕️ Meet a team member --> ⭕️ Skills assessment--> ⭕️ Meet the Leadership team

  • Grow Together: Join a culture that champions both personal and professional growth. Here, you’ll thrive as we learn, evolve, and succeed together.

  • Lead by Example: No matter your role, your leadership matters. Every team member is empowered to inspire and make an impact.

  • Results-Driven: We’re all about achieving meaningful outcomes. It’s not just about the effort, but the difference we make every day.

  • We Are Well-Makers: Be part of a movement that’s creating a healthier, happier world. Together, we make well-being a reality!

Check out some of our products

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 800+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

As a Senior UX Writer, you'll play a key role in creating user-centric content that drives adoption, engagement, and retention of new users across our suite of fitness and wellness apps.

You’ll work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and developers, to craft compelling content that not only attracts and converts users but also aligns seamlessly with our brand identity.

Key Responsibilities

Content Strategy & Creation

  • Develop and execute a content strategy to maximize conversion and enhance the experience of new users discovering our fitness and wellness apps.

  • Create and curate high-quality, engaging content for various touchpoints, including in-app messaging, onboarding sequences, notifications, and more.

  • Advocate for content that is scalable, localization-friendly, inclusive, and accessible to a global audience.

  • Collaborate with teams to develop style guides, frameworks, and content patterns that ensure consistency across all products.

Cross-Team Collaboration

  • Partner closely with designers and researchers to integrate content seamlessly into the overall design, ensuring a cohesive and intuitive user experience.

  • Establish and maintain best practices for collaborating with Content Design across product teams.

Requirements

  • Minimum of 6 years of experience in UX writing/ Content design or a related field, with a strong portfolio showcasing successful projects written in English.

  • Experience writing for American (USA) audiences

  • A genuine interest in fitness and wellness, with a deep understanding of industry trends and user needs in the digital space.

  • Experience distilling complex information into concise content that guides users across different flows.

  • Strong empathy for users and a solid grasp of user-centered design principles and inclusive writing.

  • Excellent collaboration and communication skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with the ability to prioritize and adapt to changing needs.

  • Comfortable defining your own priorities and advocating for a content-first approach when needed.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

✨ What We’re Looking For

We’re looking for a Head of Product Content to own and drive the content strategy across our apps.

You will focus on defining how high-quality content drives user outcomes, enhances product value, and supports personalization and growth.

You’ll collaborate closely with Product Managers, Content Producers, Design, Marketing, and Data teams to align content direction with product goals, user needs, and commercial objectives.

🛠 Key Responsibilities

  • Work with content leads and managers to define and own the content strategy for each product — aligning content with core user journeys, paid marketing, and growth opportunities

  • Partner with Content Production to ensure the right formats, themes, and topics are being created to support product goals

  • Develop and maintain a content taxonomy/framework (e.g., by goal, life stage, ability, etc.) that enables better content discovery, personalization, and testing

  • Collaborate with Product and UX teams to ensure content integrates meaningfully within the product experience

  • Support localization and international expansion through scalable content frameworks

  • Work with Data/Analytics to assess content performance, identify gaps, and optimize for activation, engagement, and retention

  • Champion user-centric content thinking across teams, ensuring we address the needs of diverse audiences (e.g., younger users, different ability levels, varied health goals)

  • Propose and prioritize content-driven product initiatives and expedite content innovation

  • Foster cross-functional alignment on content direction across Product, Content, and Marketing

🎯 Required Skills

  • Proven experience in content strategy or product content leadership roles, ideally within wellness, fitness, education, or consumer apps

  • Multimedia and multi-format experience — comfortable creating podcasts, educational articles, or other content packages

  • Strong understanding of how content impacts user behavior and product success

  • Experience working cross-functionally with content creators, product managers, designers, and analysts

  • Systems thinker — able to structure content at scale using taxonomies, metadata, and content models

  • Insightful and user-focused — comfortable interpreting user research and data to inform content direction

  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills

  • Strong project management skills — able to drive initiatives forward across multiple teams without direct authority

  • Passion for health, fitness, or wellness is a big bonus

This is your opportunity to influence the content direction at the product level and ensure scalable, consistent production quality across the entire function.

  • Lead development of visual and semantic concepts for new content, including workouts and app experiences.

  • Conduct market analysis, competitor research, and user behavior studies focused on content formats and preferences.

  • Organize and direct various shoot types: large-scale, test, mobile, and international.

  • Oversee all stages (pre, production, post) to ensure consistency and high standards.

  • Experience in content strategy based on user research and performance data.

  • Strong organizational skills and history of managing large teams and complex projects.
