As a global leader in the Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions.

Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of 700+ passionate professionals across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

✨ What We’re Looking For

We’re looking for a senior Localisation Lead to own and evolve our localisation efforts across product, marketing, and especially video content as we scale into new markets.

This is a high-impact, hybrid role—ideal for someone passionate about wellness and motivated by the opportunity to create content that feels local and culturally relevant.

You’ll lead a growing localisation function, overseeing everything from app UI and onboarding flows to video-based workout programmes. You’ll partner with teams across product, growth, and content to embed localisation into our workflows, championing an approach that enhances both user experience and business outcomes.

🛠 Key Responsibilities

  • Own and lead the localisation strategy and execution across the full content spectrum — including product UI, marketing, and video-based content (e.g., workout videos, audio meditations/walks)

  • Build and refine scalable localisation workflows — including tools, QA processes, content prep, and post-production performance

  • Guide localisation for video content, including subtitling, dubbing/voiceover, cultural adaptation of scripts, and in-video graphics/text using AI

  • Collaborate closely with producers, editors, and motion designers to ensure localisation is considered early in video planning and production

  • Manage a small but growing team of localisers, freelancers, or vendors — mentoring them, reviewing work, and ensuring alignment on tone, brand, and execution

  • Select and manage localisation platforms and oversee vendor relationships across translation, voiceover, and post-production

  • Develop and maintain core assets such as tone of voice guides, glossaries, style guides, and localisation toolkits

  • Use data to measure localisation quality and performance — demonstrating impact on user engagement, retention, and satisfaction across markets

  • Act as an internal advocate for localisation — educating teams on best practices and encouraging early integration in product and content workflows

🎯 Required Skills

  • 7+ years of localisation or internationalisation experience, ideally within a consumer-facing app, media company, or content-heavy digital product

  • Deep experience localising video content at scale

  • Strong leadership skills with experience guiding small teams and collaborating across disciplines (product, design, video, growth)

  • Familiarity with localisation platforms and workflows (e.g., Lokalise, Phrase, Smartling) and video localisation tools or partners

  • A user-centric mindset with a sharp editorial eye — you understand the importance of nuance, tone, and cultural sensitivity

  • Data-literate: comfortable setting KPIs, interpreting metrics, and using insights to improve content effectiveness

  • Excellent communication and project management skills: highly organised, clear, and collaborative

  • Fluency in English required; fluency in one or more additional languages is a strong plus

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We’re looking for an experienced CRM Operations & MarTech Enablement Lead to join our Customer Engagement & Retention team. In this role, you’ll ensure our CRM and marketing technology stack delivers reliable data, seamless integrations, and world-class campaign execution across our three apps.

✨ Key Responsibilities:

  • Own CRM data operations, governance, and integrations to power lifecycle campaigns across apps and channels.

  • Partner with MarTech teams to vet vendors and evaluate solutions, with Customer Engagement & Retention being the key business owners.

  • Collaborate with Data Engineering and Analytics to ensure accurate data flows, event tracking, and segmentation capabilities.

  • Lead and evolve email and cross-channel deliverability strategy, including:

    • Monitoring inbox placement, sender reputation, and engagement signals.

    • Managing dedicated and shared IPs, including IP warm-up and reputation monitoring.

    • Establishing clear separation of marketing and transactional sending domains to protect reputation and ensure reliability.

    • Implementing best practices in list hygiene, frequency management, and consent handling.

    • Ensuring authentication protocols (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) are correctly implemented and monitored.

    • Working with vendors and ESPs to conduct regular deliverability audits.

  • Enable lifecycle teams with tools, workflows, and templates that improve speed, reliability, and personalization.

  • Define and monitor KPIs for campaign effectiveness, data quality, deliverability, and operational efficiency.

  • Lead CRM/MarTech change management projects, including integrations, migrations, and rollouts.

    ✨ The ideal profile:

  • 8+ years in CRM operations, MarTech, or lifecycle marketing roles in digital product or app-based businesses.

  • Hands on expertise with a range of CRM/marketing automation platforms (e.g. Braze, Iterable, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, HubSpot).

  • Proven experience working across large-scale and niche MarTech solutions.

  • Strong technical foundation (SQL, APIs, data warehouse integrations, ETL processes).
    Deep understanding of data governance, privacy, compliance (GDPR/CCPA)

This is a unique opportunity to build a platform from scratch, setting company-wide standards and driving the direction of our mobile technology. In the Mobile App Platform team, you will architect our next-gen mobile platform, directly shaping how millions experience wellness. You will design and implement core platform solutions, empowering product teams to rapidly build and customize applications. You will also own the mobile infrastructure blueprint, enabling teams to focus on features and experiments, free from underlying infrastructure concerns. This role demands a strong problem-solver who thrives on building, as you'll define a platform that scales to millions, creating a lasting legacy in mobile wellness.

Key responsibilities:

  • Help build and evolve scalable mobile infrastructure, tooling, and shared components to support multiple Welltech mobile apps

  • Contribute to libraries, SDKs, and CI/CD pipelines that improve developer experience and apps quality

  • Work closely with product teams to support the adoption of platform solutions

  • Write clean, testable, and performant code with an eye on maintainability

  • Support modularization, reusability, and standardization efforts across mobile apps

  • Identify common problems across apps and solve them in a consistent, scalable way

  • Participate in code reviews, documentation, and knowledge sharing within the team

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with backend, frontend, security, and infrastructure teams to enable seamless integration and platform alignment

Required skills:

  • Solid Android development experience with Kotlin, including fundamentals like coroutines, networking, persistence, and performance optimization

  • Experience with Jetpack Compose and modular, scalable UI architectures

  • Excellent understanding of architectural patterns (MVVM, MVI, DI) and modular codebases

  • Proven ability to craft clean, maintainable, and scalable code

  • Strong ability to design for reliability, scalability, and performance

  • Experience working with CI/CD pipelines and tooling (e.g., Bitrise, Fastlane, Gradle, custom scripts)

  • Strong advocate of design for testability, automated testing, and shift-left quality mindset

  • Passion for improving developer experience and shipping high-quality code

  • Product-minded approach with a bias for pragmatic, maintainable solutions

  • Hands-on experience with OWASP mobile security best practices

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We’re seeking a Backend Engineer who loves building reliable, scalable systems that power great user experiences. You’ll design and support APIs, manage cloud infrastructure, and collaborate across teams to deliver personalized wellness features to millions of users.

You have strong Python skills, experience with relational databases, and enjoy working in cloud-native environments. You value clear communication, fast learning, and finding the right tool for each challenge - even if it means stepping outside your comfort zone.

You’ll join the User Trust Team working on a User Profile initiative - an essential part of our platform foundations and Ecosystem. The team safeguards and enhances the user journey across platforms by managing authentication, identity, and privacy workflows. From handling data takeout and deletion requests to developing a unified user profile experience, we’re focused on giving users control while unlocking smarter, more personalized product experiences. You’ll join a cross-functional team in the discovery phase of a critical initiative - streamlining user identity and profile management across our core products to improve operational efficiency and drive growth.


Key responsibilities:

  • Spearhead development of a user-centric initiative: Collaborate with product, engineering, and data teams to spearhead development of a new initiative revolutionizing our products.

  • Contribute to System Architecture: Collaborate on designing reliable, maintainable, and scalable systems to support millions of users worldwide.

  • Integrate Cloud Services: Leverage AWS services (e.g. Lambda, API Gateway, S3) to build modern, serverless solutions.

  • Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Partner with product managers, designers, data experts, and content teams to bring cohesive, user-centric experiences to life.

  • Prioritize Sustainable Quality: Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code, with a focus on continuous improvement and long-term reliability.

  • Contribute to Team Success: Work effectively with teammates and stakeholders to achieve shared goals. Share knowledge openly, communicate clearly, help resolve obstacles, and foster constructive, respectful discussions to solve problems together.

Required skills:

  • Product Mindset: Proven ability to translate user needs into impactful features with a strong focus on delivering value.

  • Backend Engineering Expertise: Strong experience designing and building scalable backend systems in Python with a solid understanding of API design and system architecture.

  • Cloud Infrastructure Experience: Familiarity with cloud services, especially AWS (e.g. Lambda, API Gateway, S3, CloudFormation).

  • Database Knowledge: Experience working with relational databases such as Postgres, and familiarity with SQLAlchemy or other ORMs.

  • Engineering Culture Contributor: You help improve team workflows and elevate code quality by contributing to shared practices and fostering collaborative ways of working.

  • Communication Skills: Strong English communication skills to work effectively with an international, agile team.

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

What We're Looking For

We are seeking a Senior Payments Operations Specialist to lead and optimize our payment processes, focusing on monitoring key billing performance indicators, managing routing and cascading strategies, and ensuring seamless transaction flows. In this role, you will collaborate closely with payment providers and cross-functional teams to identify and resolve anomalies, improve operational efficiency, and reduce transaction failures and costs. You will play a vital part in scaling and strengthening our payment infrastructure while maintaining proactive communication and high-quality standards.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Monitor key billing performance indicators (KPIs), including approval rates, declined transactions and their reasons, timeouts, processing times, and payment distribution

  • Establish and optimize scalable payment operational processes, encompassing routing, cascading, and retry strategies

  • Escalate drops and anomalies to providers and relevant internal teams, ensuring timely feedback on estimated times of fixes (ETAs) and status updates

  • Collaborate with various departments such as marketing, product, CRM, customer support, and analytics to address their requests

  • Deeply analyze current payment flows, methods, provider back-offices, existing monitoring, analysis reports, and internal tools

  • Communicate critical changes in provider terms or billing to relevant teams

  • Conduct payment and routing/cascading tests, and monitor results

  • Identify opportunities to streamline workflows, enhance system functionality, and reduce transactional errors and costs

Required skills:

  • 3+ years of experience as a Billing Specialist or Billing Analyst in online payments

  • Strong aptitude for numbers and processing transactional information

  • Proficient in Microsoft Excel and other MS Office software

  • Solid understanding of online payment funnels and flows

  • Experience in written communication with international customers or partners

  • Basic understanding of payment and transactional systems and services

  • Eagerness to expand knowledge about payment systems

Soft Skills:

  • Exceptional attention to detail

  • High level of responsibility

  • Proactive approach

  • Strong communication skills

  • Excellent teamwork abilities

  • Aptitude for multitasking and quick reaction to processing problems

  • Persistence

  • Ability to effectively address and resolve issues in communication with providers

Nice to have:

  • Experience with Tableau, SQL, and logs

What We're Looking For

We are looking for an experienced and analytical Senior Google Ads Specialist to join our team. You will build and manage highly impactful Google Ads acquisition campaigns and have an enthusiasm for testing growth opportunities to drive conversions, revenue, and ROI. An entrepreneurial spirit, a creative mindset for pushing boundaries, and the ability to work effectively with team members and stakeholders are some of the key skills we are looking for. This is an exciting opportunity to leverage a $1M+ budget and have a meaningful impact on the performance of the company.

✨ Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage multi-million $ SEM budgets optimizing towards long term scale and profitability

  • Manage and optimize best-in-class Google Ads and Microsoft Ads campaigns across various placements, including Google Search, Google Display Network, Demand Gen, Pmax, YouTube and other to achieve business goals

  • Analyze campaign performance data and onsite and funnel metrics, identify trends, and provide actionable insights to ensure pacing to targets whilst driving incremental business growth

  • Set the strategy and roadmap for scaling paid acquisition campaigns efficiently, while prioritizing effectively

  • Plan and implement experiments incl. A/B & MVT tests of campaign variables to increase the efficiency of campaign budgets and drive ROI improvements

  • Recommend creative and landing page strategies and consult on creative and landing page optimizations

  • Track KPIs to assess performance and efficient execution of KPI and communicate performance and recommendations for continuous improvement to the relevant business stakeholders

  • Conduct regular competitive research and analysis to identify performance growth points

  • Actively collaborate with colleagues from other teams (creative, product etc.) to achieve performance goals and maximize ROI

  • Maintain partnerships with paid search ad vendors (e.g. Google & Microsoft) and stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in Google Ads, and share insights with the team to improve overall performance

✨ The ideal profile:

  • 4+ years of experience in Google Ads campaign management and optimization, including Google Display and Demand Gen, is a plus to have experience in Meta

  • Experience managing budgets of at least five digits per month

  • Autonomy and a strong ability to proactively generate impactful solutions

  • Strong focus on performance and delivering results

  • Experience in managing multiple projects simultaneously, with the ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines

  • Proficiency in English - B2 or higher level

  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively communicate ideas, feedback, and instructions to team members, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams

  • Analytical mindset, knowledge of Microsoft Office (MS Excel) and Google Workspace (Google Sheets, Google Docs, Google Slides)), experience with Google Analytics and data visualization tools such as Tableau and Clarisights

  • Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and circumstances, with the ability to pivot quickly when necessary

  • Experience with other media buying solutions such as DSPs, paid social and native ads platforms or Apple Search Ads would be highly beneficial

  • A strategic thinker with a passion for innovation, and the ability to turn complex ideas into simple, actionable plans

  • Track record of successful change and project management

  • Strong attention to detail and experience in leveraging data and analytics to make informed strategic decisions and optimize product performance

  • Passion for learning and self-improvement

✨ First Quarter Expectations:

  • The specialist has understood all the metrics and knows our processes and reports

  • The specialist independently manages the project, adheres to best practices, achieves the target ROI, and knows how to scale and cut volumes when necessary

jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

Today, we are embarking on a journey to reshape our product into a highly personalized, coach-like experience that provides holistic care to our users across all aspects of wellness and fitness. To accomplish this, we are shaping a new team on a mission to provide our users with world-class wellness and fitness content through the new product experience.

It’s a greenfield opportunity to try to disrupt the wellness & fitness industry. We are looking for a product-minded, impact-driven engineer to join us on this journey!

What We're Looking For
We’re seeking a product-minded, impact-driven Full Stack Engineer who thrives at the intersection of impact and innovation. You’ll help architect and build an end-to-end product experience, from backend systems to frontend interfaces, and collaborate closely with design, product, and data to move fast and learn even faster.

You bring backend expertise (Python preferably or a language agnostic approach), strong frontend fundamentals (React or similar), and a bias toward rapid learning through experimentation. While not required, we’d be especially excited if you’re curious about or experienced in mobile development.

You’ll be an advocate for highly iterative development approaches, data-driven decision-making in your team fueling our mission to bring health and wellness to millions.

Key responsibilities:

  • Shape a Greenfield Product: Build and evolve both frontend and backend systems for a brand-new wellness platform integrating video, content, data, and user interactivity.

  • Own the Full Stack Development: Take end-to-end ownership from designing APIs and building interfaces to connecting cloud services and instrumenting analytics.

  • Lead Frontend Development: Deliver responsive, performant UIs using TypeScript and modern frameworks like React or Next.js.

  • Drive Rapid Prototyping: Build lovable prototypes and MVPs to test product hypotheses quickly, iterating based on real user feedback and data.

  • Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Partner with product managers, designers, data experts, and content teams to bring cohesive, user-centric experiences to life.

  • Balance Quality & Speed: Maintain a clean, scalable codebase while shipping fast and learning fast.

  • Mentor & lead by example: Provide guidance to team members, lead team level product and engineering initiatives, influence coding standards, support your team in making critical decisions

Required skills:

  • Product Mindset: Proven ability to translate user needs into impactful product features, with a strong focus on delivering value.

  • Backend Engineering: Strong experience designing and building scalable backend systems. Proficient in Python or similar languages (e.g., Kotlin, Go, Java), with a solid understanding of API design, data modeling, and system architecture.

  • Frontend Familiarity: You have experience with modern frontend frameworks like React and TypeScript. Comfortable collaborating and architecting client-side features.

  • Cloud Infrastructure Experience: Familiarity with cloud services, especially AWS (e.g. Lambda, API Gateway, S3, CloudFormation).

  • Full-Stack System Design: Ability to architect and implement reliable, maintainable systems across the stack.

  • Fast Iteration and Experimentation: Experience in environments that favor rapid prototyping, testing, and learning.

  • Engineering Culture Contributor: You mentor peers, improve team workflows, and elevate code quality through strong practices and collaboration.

Nice to have:

  • Familiarity or interest in mobile development (React Native, Flutter) or building experiences involving video, multimedia, or streaming.

Candidate journey: ⭕️ Recruiter call ----> ⭕️ Live Code Design Review --->  ⭕️System Design Interview -----> ⭕️ Meet the hiring manager

  • Grow Together: Join a culture that champions both personal and professional growth. Here, you’ll thrive as we learn, evolve, and succeed together.

  • Lead by Example: No matter your role, your leadership matters. Every team member is empowered to inspire and make an impact.

jobs.title: Visual Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
🚀 Who Are We?

Welcome to Welltech—where health meets innovation! 🌍 As a global leader in Health & Fitness industry, we’ve crossed over 220 million installs with life-changing apps, all designed to boost well-being for millions. Our mission? To improve the health of millions of people through intuitive nutrition trackers, powerful fitness solutions, and personalized wellness journeys—all powered by a diverse team of over 700+ passionate professionals with a presence across 5 hubs.

Why Welltech? Imagine joining a team where your impact on global health and wellness is felt daily. At Welltech, we strive to be proactive wellness partners for our users, while continually evolving ourselves.

🎨 What We're Looking For

We’re looking for a Visual Designer to own and evolve the creative layer of our product experience. This role combines design craft, visual storytelling, and scalable production systems. You’ll shape the Visual Playbook, drive brand-safe innovation, define motion language, and coordinate freelancers while transforming functional product flows into emotionally resonant user journeys. If you thrive at the intersection of design systems, content production, and collaboration, you’ll make a huge impact here.

Key Responsibilities

  • Visual Playbook: Create, maintain, and evolve the Visual Playbook (structure, patterns, naming/versioning) aligned with product strategy, brand narrative, and platform updates.

  • Product Experience: Own the visual storytelling layer across onboarding, paywalls, progress flows, and program experiences—defining motion intent, type hierarchy, imagery, and overall look & feel.

  • Localization: Adapt visuals for different markets , ensuring cultural sensitivity and accessibility.

  • Brand-Safe Innovation: Propose and test visual hypotheses (A/B, multivariate) to improve conversion and retention, codifying winning patterns into reusable standards.
    System & Production Assets: Extend and maintain the product design system (asset standards, components, variants). Prepare export-ready assets, thumbnails, video graphics, and marketing-adjacent visuals.

  • Motion & Interaction: Collaborate with motion designers to define interactions, animations, and Lottie assets that clarify user journeys and enhance comprehension.

  • Cross-Team Collaboration: Partner with Product, Growth, Content, and Design leads; write clear briefs for freelancers; review and QA deliverables to ensure compliance with the Playbook.

  • AI-Assisted Design: Use approved AI tools (Midjourney, Firefly, Stable Diffusion, GPT, etc.) for exploration, variations, and batch production—while ensuring outputs meet brand standards.

  • Tool Proficiency: Operate efficiently in Figma (auto-layout, variants, variables, prototyping), Adobe Illustrator/Photoshop, and asset management tools; maintain structured, reusable, and developer-ready files.

Required Skills

  • Strong portfolio showcasing mobile product visuals and storytelling - across onboarding, paywalls, flows, and program experiences (iOS/Android).

  • Proven experience creating or contributing to visual playbooks, design systems, or component libraries.

  • Ability to translate brand guidelines into scalable product visuals, balancing clarity and creativity.

  • Experience with localization, accessibility, and cross-platform adaptation.

  • Comfortable working with motion principles, basic video direction (moodboards, shoot briefs), and collaborating with production teams.

  • Skilled in Figma (auto-layout, variants,structured libraries), Adobe Creative Suite; familiarity with Lottie and AI design tools is a plus.

  • Excellent organizational skills (Figma hygiene, asset libraries, spec handoff) and ability to deliver on time.

  • Strong communicator who can collaborate across teams and coordinate freelancers with clear, actionable briefs.

Nice to have:

  • Basic video direction skills (moodboards, briefs, set look & feel).

  • Comfort with AI-assisted tools (e.g., Midjourney, Firefly, Stable Diffusion).
